name: Toys In Space
description:
Toys In Space was made for 'The Week of Awesome II'. The goal of the game is to retrieve the stolen toys by pulling them in to your spaceship by using your
magnet. This is done by sitting in the correct seat in the spaceship. You have to move to different parts of the spaceship to move it or To move the spaceship or to use the guns.

Refer to the gameplay video for a detailed description on how to play the game.
